title: Goldman Sachs | Analyst | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science, Tier-1 College, India  
Years of Experience: 0 (Fresher)  
Prior Experience: Summer Analyst at Goldman Sachs  
Date of the Offer: Pre-placement Offer (PPO) post Internship (July 2024)
Company: Goldman Sachs  
Title/Level: Analyst (SDE-1)  
Location: Hyderabad  
Salary: ₹23L  
Relocation/Signing Bonus: ₹7L  
Stock Bonus: None  
Bonus: Supplementary Salary of ₹6.5L  
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹36.5L  
Benefits: Standard Goldman Sachs benefits  
Other details: Joining in June 2025

title: Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) | GET | Navi Mumbai | 2024 Batch

title: Goldman Sachs | Associate | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech, CSE, Tier3
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at banking company
Date of the Offer: mid Jan
Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: Associate / SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 35L base including pf
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3L (signing)
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: 9L for first year (pro rated, becomes 7L for this year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 LPA
Benefits: Gym, Medical including parents, cab etc
Other details: - Did not accept the offer as I received another job with same comp but hybrid / remote

title: Confluent | Software Engineer | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS from Tier-1
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 2 months Summer Intern
Date of the Offer: Jan, 2025
Company: Confluent
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore (WFH)
Salary: 24.15L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 75k joining bonus
Stock bonus: $39,500 for 3 years, ~11.33L/yr vesting quaterly
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~36L First year
Benefits: gratuity, leave, insurance, one-time reimbursement for wfh setup, etc
Other details: On-Campus placement. Company removed annual bonus(performance based) for everyone and added it in base.
